creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: architectural diorama (a) of a corner of a tiled room with white marble bench; left wall is vertical slats with slanted roofline; roof is wood painted turquoise; floor of room covered with square turquoise tiles; right wall is covered with green and purple square tiles with a large cut out resembling the profile of a vase; at left is a marble block which serves as a pedestal for a turquoise and purple glazed vase (b); vase has flared rim and narrow flared foot with wide rounded body
markings: paper label on base: CLIFF GARTEN / \"Situation #2\" 1986 / Ceramic vase, tile, marble, / stucco, wood 12 1/2\" x 13\" x 16\" / $1500.00
title: Situation #2
